extends IQMUIContinuousNestedScrollCommon

    • 方法详细资料

      • consumeScroll

        void consumeScroll(int dyUnconsumed)
        consume scroll
        参数:
        dyUnconsumed - the delta value to consume

      • smoothScrollYBy

        void smoothScrollYBy(int dy,
                     int duration)

      • stopScroll

        void stopScroll()

      • getContentHeight

        int getContentHeight()
        sometimes the content of BottomView is not enough to scroll, so BottomView should tell the this info to QMUIContinuousNestedScrollLayout
        返回:
        HEIGHT_IS_ENOUGH_TO_SCROLL if can scroll, or content height.
